level.heading: Tax abatements for new residential developments --Regulations.
level.text: The Mayor shall promulgate regulations to implement §§ 47-857.01 through 47-857.09 within 180 days after the effective date of this section [April 19, 2002].

level.heading: Delegation of Authority
level.text: Delegation of Authority Pursuant to D.C. Law 14-183, the "Housing Act of 2002", see Mayor's Order 2002-155, September 13, 2002 (49 DCR 8623).
